001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ModuleInfoFinder;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.PathSupport;
005import java.lang.module.ModuleDescriptor;
006import java.lang.module.ModuleDescriptor.Requires;
007import java.lang.module.ModuleFinder;
008import java.lang.module.ModuleReference;
009import java.nio.file.Path;
010import java.util.List;
011import java.util.Set;
012import java.util.TreeSet;
013import java.util.stream.Collectors;
014import java.util.stream.Stream;
015
016/** An Explorer finds files, lists modules, and helps explore other assets and states. */
017public record Explorer(Bach bach) {
018
019  public ModuleFinder newModuleInfoFinder(Path root) {
020    return ModuleInfoFinder.of(root);
021  }
022
023  public List<Path> findJavaFiles() {
024    return findJavaFiles(bach.path().root());
025  }
026
027  public List<Path> findJavaFiles(Path root) {
028    return PathSupport.find(root, 99, PathSupport::isJavaFile);
029  }
030
031  public List<Path> findModuleInfoJavaFiles() {
032    return findModuleInfoJavaFiles(bach.path().root());
033  }
034
035  public List<Path> findModuleInfoJavaFiles(Path root) {
036    return PathSupport.find(root, 99, PathSupport::isModuleInfoJavaFile);
037  }
038
039  public List<String> listMissingExternalModules(String... more) {
040    return listMissingExternalModules(ModuleFinder.of(bach.path().externalModules()), more);
041  }
042
043  public List<String> listMissingExternalModules(ModuleFinder finder, String... more) {
044    return listMissingExternalModules(List.of(finder), Set.of(more));
045  }
046
047  public List<String> listMissingExternalModules(List<ModuleFinder> finders, Set<String> more) {
048    // Populate a set with all module names being in a "requires MODULE;" directive
049    var requires = new TreeSet<>(more); // more required modules
050    for (var finder : finders) requires.addAll(required(finder)); // main, test, and other modules
051    // Remove names of declared modules from various module finders
052    requires.removeAll(declared(ModuleFinder.ofSystem()));
053    for (var finder : finders) requires.removeAll(declared(finder));
054    return List.copyOf(requires);
055  }
056
057  public static TreeSet<String> declared(ModuleFinder finder) {
058    return declared(finder.findAll().stream().map(ModuleReference::descriptor));
059  }
060
061  public static TreeSet<String> declared(Stream<ModuleDescriptor> descriptors) {
062    return descriptors.map(ModuleDescriptor::name).collect(Collectors.toCollection(TreeSet::new));
063  }
064
065  public static TreeSet<String> required(ModuleFinder finder) {
066    return required(finder.findAll().stream().map(ModuleReference::descriptor));
067  }
068
069  public static TreeSet<String> required(Stream<ModuleDescriptor> descriptors) {
070    return descriptors
071        .map(ModuleDescriptor::requires)
072        .flatMap(Set::stream)
073        .filter(Explorer::required)
074        .map(Requires::name)
075        .collect(Collectors.toCollection(TreeSet::new));
076  }
077
078  public static boolean required(Requires requires) {
079    var modifiers = requires.modifiers();
080    if (modifiers.isEmpty() || modifiers.contains(Requires.Modifier.TRANSITIVE)) return true;
081    if (modifiers.contains(Requires.Modifier.MANDATED)) return false;
082    if (modifiers.contains(Requires.Modifier.SYNTHETIC)) return false;
083    return !modifiers.contains(Requires.Modifier.STATIC);
084  }
085}
